name: Lisinopril
usage: Expands blood vessels to improve blood flow and lower blood pressure

name: Amlodipine
usage: Prevents calcium buildup in arteries to lower blood pressure
sideEffects: Swelling ankles and feet, flushing, headache, dizziness

name: Losartan
usage: Blocks hormone angiotensin to prevent blood vessel constriction

name: Hydrochlorothiazide
usage: Removes excess fluid and salt to improve blood pressure
sideEffects: Increased urination, dizziness, muscle cramps, rash

name: Beta blockers
usage: Block epinephrine effects to lower blood pressure
